methods.name: allocate
methods.short: creates a buffer without allocating any memory yet glGenBuffers, allocates a GL buffer

methods.name: allocate
methods.parameters: GLsizeiptr bytes, const void *data, GLenum usage

methods.name: allocate
methods.parameters: GLsizeiptr bytes, GLenum usage
methods.short: creates a buffer and allocates the required number of bytes glGenBuffers + glNamedBufferData: https://www.opengl.org/sdk/docs/man4/html/glBufferData.xhtml before GL 4.5 emulates glNamedBufferData by binding to last known target for this buffer uploading data to that target and unbinding again

methods.name: bindBase
methods.parameters: GLenum target, GLuint index

methods.name: bindRange
methods.parameters: GLenum target, GLuint index, GLintptr offset, GLsizeiptr size

methods.name: copyTo
methods.parameters: ofBufferObject &dstBuffer, int readOffset, int writeOffset, size_t size

methods.name: getId
methods.short: returns the id of the buffer if it's allocated or 0 otherwise

methods.name: map
methods.short: glMapNamedBuffer: https://www.opengl.org/sdk/docs/man4/html/glMapBuffer.xhtml before GL 4.5 emulates glMapNamedBuffer by binding to last known target for this buffer and mapping that target

methods.name: mapRange
methods.parameters: GLintptr offset, GLsizeiptr length, GLenum access
methods.short: glMapNamedBufferRange: https://www.opengl.org/sdk/docs/man4/html/glMapBufferRange.xhtml before GL 4.5 emulates glMapNamedBufferRange by binding to last known target for this buffer and mapping that target

methods.name: mapRange
methods.parameters: GLintptr offset, GLsizeiptr length, GLenum access

methods.short: typed version of setData, same functionality but guesses the size from the size of the passed vector and size of the type

methods.name: setData
methods.parameters: GLsizeiptr bytes, const void *data, GLenum usage
methods.short: glNamedBufferData: https://www.opengl.org/sdk/docs/man4/html/glBufferData.xhtml before GL 4.5 emulates glNamedBufferData by binding to last known target for this buffer uploading data to that target and unbinding again

methods.name: unbindBase
methods.parameters: GLenum target, GLuint index
methods.short: binds the given target and index to buffer 0

methods.name: unbindRange
methods.parameters: GLenum target, GLuint index
methods.short: binds the given target and index to 0

methods.name: unmap
methods.short: glUnmapNamedBuffer: https://www.opengl.org/sdk/docs/man4/html/glUnmapBuffer.xhtml before GL 4.5 emulates glUnmapNamedBuffer by unmapping and unbinding the last known target for this buffer

methods.name: unmapRange
methods.short: same as unmap, just to make the api more clear
typed version of updateData, same functionality but guesses the size from the size of the passed vector and size of the type

methods.name: updateData
methods.parameters: GLsizeiptr bytes, const void *data

methods.short: typed version of updateData, same functionality but guesses the size from the size of the passed vector and size of the type

methods.name: updateData
methods.parameters: GLintptr offset, GLsizeiptr bytes, const void *data
